# Pagination Component

### Pagination

**Exports:**
- `Pagination` - Pagination component

**Usage:**
```svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import { Pagination } from 'kampsy-ui';

	const prev = {
	  title: 'Home',
	  href: '#',
	};
 
	const next = {
	  title: 'Introduction',
	  href: '#',
	};
</script>

<Pagination previous={prev} {next} />
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```

## Documentation

Visit http://ui.kampsy.xyz/pagination for full documentation and examples.
